text: EASILY my favorite song in Kirby Franchise. The D Major/E Minor, the amount of chilliness in the song, the small vocals really soothes me out, and soft-touch cymbals in the background. I really think this underrated compared to the others and it's not as noticed. One of my favorite songs of all time. '3'
author: Starlust

author: dddmemaybe

text: I can feel the melancholy and chilliness in this theme, I love it. Kirby really is synonymous with awesome music. There have been record high temperatures here in Montreal during the month and it seems like it will stay like that for a while. 11 degrees celcius forecast on the 24th? Never seen that before... though for some of you that might be cold depending on where you live! There certainly won't be any snow on the 25th, I can still see my green lawn outside.
author: SupraDarky

text:
I know... Last year was the first year I was in Montreal and it was -40C once. This year, it hasn't dipped past melting point once. Ok, ONCE. But after that...  Heck, I think it rained less than a week ago. 

Which Kirby game is your favorite? Kirby's a series I never got into, though I've considered epic yarn.
author: terracannon876

text: +terracannon876 Kirby's Epic Yarn is a good game.  I consider it to be a black sheep of the series since it's so different compared to the other games in the series.
